channel.title: OldSchool Trilogy (Live Release online now)
channel.description:
[img]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/OST%20Forums%20banner.png[/img]
OST [OldSchool Trilogy]
Link to forums: [url=http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/]http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/[/url] Link to Client DL: [url=http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/t2-os-trilogy-dl-client[/url] Donations : [url=http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/t47-ost-donting]http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/t47-ost-donting[/url]
[SIZE=5]Need PKers to Fill the Wilderness!(:[/SIZE]
[color=blue]About Us: We Released for Everyone the play on 07/04/15! We have a semi small but very nice community. This server was made to be a basic oldschool pking server where you can quickly level & quickly make money for the gear you need to start pking. (some of the best gear does take some time to get) My goal is to have a full wilderness all the time and having a community that comes together to do thinks like clan pking, bossing, god wars, & Raid (future boss, with plans to need 5-10 man raid team). The comat xp is fast, and average skilling xp so players can take there time and skill if the dont feel like pvp or pvm. Nearly every skill works and makes money on here & except for the top for iteams most gear is semi easy to obtain so no one should really have to much trouble making some money.(: I have 3 people that help me code the server and there is normally atleast a couple small updates everyday.
The Idea for OST came from my favorite rsps i've played which was 2speced; a Pk server that have every easy lvling and you could make quick money and start pking within no time after starting (atleast in welfare gear). Ofcource 2speced was delta and had its problems which is my im not doing a complete remake of 2speced, im using the idea of quick money and leveling and adding nice welfare pk gear to shops; then im changing things up to make it my own.
Features: -pk fast -::pure -1m starter -all basic pk gear in shops (whips Temp) -3 difficulties clue/ mystery box -full godwars -dagg kings -kbd -nice slayer with rewards -os items (bandos, armadyl, void, dbow, whip, barrows, ags, dds, ect. -added arma cbow and comp cape -enhanced crafting to make enchanted bolts -skill, pvm, bossing, and pking makes money -nearly all skills (all should be fixed very soon) -barrows -custom castle assault minigame (torso, runedef, bgloves, ect -pkp shop -slayer shop -donation, vote, and loyatly shop coming soon -enhanced combat -sea turtles heal 24hp but need 92 fishing (33 wilderness) &much more
Work in Progress: -Raid custom boss needing 5-10man raid team for rares mystery box and other nice gear -untrimmed skill capes for 100m xp -titles shop -don & vote shop -slayer ring - Cosmetic/ rare Lava Whip from kril -two difficulties for jad (23waves for firecape or 63waves for firecape and title) -proper farming -full agility -gear that reduce run/ energy usage so that you can run longer (helps for skilling and deep pking retreats if used) &much more
Anyways here are the updates ive done too OS Trilogy sofar: [SPOILER=Click to Extend]*GodWars updates: -command to tele to gwd for now, ill add to boss tele later (6/18/15 -added all npc (6/18/15) -added kc (6/18/15) -added kc interface and player saving (6/18/15) -Added objects & clickobject to get you to all boss rooms (6/19/15) -Added correct correct attack type, and animations for bosses. (06/28/15) -bosses and minons attack when you walk in door (06/28/15) *Drops -cleared the drops (06/27/15) -rewrote the drops from nothing (06/27/15) *Crafting -no longer get glory or fury when cutting dragstone/onyx (06/27/15) -you first cut gems, then cut again for bolt tips (06/27/15) -use cut gem with gold bar for ammy (06/27/15) *Shops updates: -cleared the shops so i could start fresh. (06/20/15) -general store (redone) (06/20/15) -weapons (redone) (06/20/15) -armour (redone) (06/20/15) -pure (added) (06/20/15) -range (redone) (06/20/15) -magic (redone) (06/20/15) -skiller shop (redone) (06/20/15) -slayer shop (redone) (06/20/15) -pking shop (redone) (06/20/15) -clan capes shop (added) (06/20/15) -buying anything shop (06/22/15) -added assault and void shop (06/22/15) *Assault -custom assult mini (similar to 2speced) (06/28/15) -assault point system (06/28/15) -kill 5 different monsters for assault points (06/28/15) -assault pnts shop (06/28/15) -prayer can not be used in assault mini (06/28/15) *Teleports -base was using npc to tele you through the game (deleted) (06/25/15) -added spellbook teleports(06/25/15) -seperated multi and single pk teleports(06/25/15) *items -added comp cape w/ no stats (06/26/15) -added arma cbow w/ +10 range compared to rcbow(06/26/15) *clues -deleted old clues (06/25/15) -added 4 clue difficulties (06/25/15) - easy clue, dropped by easy monsters, give low lvl rewards casket (06/25/15) - med clue, dropped by harder slayer monsters and tz, gives med lvl reward casket (06/25/15) - hard clue, dropped by bosses, gives high level reward casket (06/25/15) - random clue, pkp + assult + pc + slayer point shops, gives a random casket (06/25/15) - cleared old rewards and rewrote (06/25/15) *Edited tons of prices (6/22/15) *Made torso, barrows gloves, and defenders tradable and pkable (like 2speced) (6/22/15) *changed xp rated for easy meele, med mage, and hard range xp (6/22/15) *added pure command permanently (like 2speced) (06/28/15) *added maxed command temp for beta testing (06/28/15) *added barrows command 1k every set temp for beta testing (06/28/15) *changed all basic server and client naming, ect. (06/29/15) *fixed godwars int. so it changes without have to relog (06/29/15) *changed arma cbow int. to wield (06/29/15) *added 1b ticket (06/29/15) ***Have to look at forums update news for any updates after this***
[/SPOILER]
Media:

Bandos [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/bandos.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/bandos.png[/img][/URL]
arma [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/arma.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/arma.png[/img][/URL]
Barrage/ hyrbid [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/barrage.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/barrage.png[/img][/URL]
veng [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/veng%20combo.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/veng%20combo.png[/img][/URL]
Ags/ mid hybrid fight [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/ags.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/ags.png[/img][/URL]
Turtle fishing (33wild) [URL=http://s593.photobucket.com/user/michaelrobson02/media/Turtles%20proof.png.html][IMG]http://i593.photobucket.com/albums/tt19/michaelrobson02/Turtles%20proof.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER]
I will be adding a lot more and posting in on here every couple days or maybe even more often. Last time post was updated: 06/29/15 Thanks Everybody! -Michael

item.title: OldSchool Trilogy (Live Release online now)
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

I’m not sure why your client is the only one that has trouble extracting the cache when a dozen other servers i’ve tried today have all worked. i was going to give it a try but you need to fix your client.

Read full topic

item.title: OldSchool Trilogy (Live Release online now)
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

cause im noob and thought server was going to grow fast cause i had people ready to play before release and i thought people would love to join os rsps (rs07 items n bosses in progress) lol guess i just underestimated how hard it was to get server to grow and over estimated how big of vps i would need.

Read full topic

item.title: OldSchool Trilogy (Live Release online now)
item.dc:creator: @killer-bros-owner Shane95
item.description:
@killer-bros-owner wrote:

Why in the name… Why are you paying over $50 already for a VPS?

Aside from the ridiculous amount you’re paying for a small server to begin with, best of luck with the future of your server

Read full topic

item.title: OldSchool Trilogy (Live Release online now)
item.dc:creator: @g0d_of_war1 g0d of war1
item.description:
@g0d_of_war1 wrote:

Looks okay, and FYI you shouldn’t say need donators to keep vps going lol, players come if they find interest in your rsps, want a great player base make your rsps unique things that can set it apart from other rsps

Read full topic

item.title: OldSchool Trilogy (Live Release online now)
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

OST [OldSchool Trilogy]

Link to forums: http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/
Link to Client DL: [url=http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/t2-os-trilogy-dl-client[/url]
Donations : http://trilogyrsps.forumotion.com/t47-ost-donting

[SIZE=5]Need PKers to Fill the Wilderness!(:[/SIZE]

[color=blue]About Us: We Released for Everyone the play on 07/04/15! We have a semi small but very nice community.
This server was made to be a basic oldschool pking server where you can quickly level & quickly make money for the gear you need to start pking. (some of the best gear does take some time to get)
My goal is to have a full wilderness all the time and having a community that comes together to do thinks like clan pking, bossing, god wars, & Raid (future boss, with plans to need 5-10 man raid team).
The comat xp is fast, and average skilling xp so players can take there time and skill if the dont feel like pvp or pvm.
Nearly every skill works and makes money on here & except for the top for iteams most gear is semi easy to obtain so no one should really have to much trouble making some money.(:
I have 3 people that help me code the server and there is normally atleast a couple small updates everyday.

The Idea for OST came from my favorite rsps i’ve played which was 2speced; a Pk server that have every easy lvling and you could make quick money and start pking within no time after starting (atleast in welfare gear).
Ofcource 2speced was delta and had its problems which is my im not doing a complete remake of 2speced, im using the idea of quick money and leveling and adding nice welfare pk gear to shops; then im changing things up to make it my own.

Features:
-pk fast
-::pure
-1m starter
-all basic pk gear in shops (whips Temp)
-3 difficulties clue/ mystery box
-full godwars
-dagg kings
-kbd
-nice slayer with rewards
-os items (bandos, armadyl, void, dbow, whip, barrows, ags, dds, ect.
-added arma cbow and comp cape
-enhanced crafting to make enchanted bolts
-skill, pvm, bossing, and pking makes money
-nearly all skills (all should be fixed very soon)
-barrows
-custom castle assault minigame (torso, runedef, bgloves, ect
-pkp shop
-slayer shop
-donation, vote, and loyatly shop coming soon
-enhanced combat
-sea turtles heal 24hp but need 92 fishing (33 wilderness)
&much more

Work in Progress:
-Raid custom boss needing 5-10man raid team for rares mystery box and other nice gear
-untrimmed skill capes for 100m xp
-titles shop
-don & vote shop
-slayer ring

  • Cosmetic/ rare Lava Whip from kril
    -two difficulties for jad (23waves for firecape or 63waves for firecape and title)
    -proper farming
    -full agility
    -gear that reduce run/ energy usage so that you can run longer (helps for skilling and deep pking retreats if used)
    &much more

Anyways here are the updates ive done too OS Trilogy sofar:
[SPOILER=Click to Extend]*GodWars updates:
-command to tele to gwd for now, ill add to boss tele later (6/18/15
-added all npc (6/18/15)
-added kc (6/18/15)
-added kc interface and player saving (6/18/15)
-Added objects & clickobject to get you to all boss rooms (6/19/15)
-Added correct correct attack type, and animations for bosses. (06/28/15)
-bosses and minons attack when you walk in door (06/28/15)
*Drops
-cleared the drops (06/27/15)
-rewrote the drops from nothing (06/27/15)
*Crafting
-no longer get glory or fury when cutting dragstone/onyx (06/27/15)
-you first cut gems, then cut again for bolt tips (06/27/15)
-use cut gem with gold bar for ammy (06/27/15)
*Shops updates:
-cleared the shops so i could start fresh. (06/20/15)
-general store (redone) (06/20/15)
-weapons (redone) (06/20/15)
-armour (redone) (06/20/15)
-pure (added) (06/20/15)
-range (redone) (06/20/15)
-magic (redone) (06/20/15)
-skiller shop (redone) (06/20/15)
-slayer shop (redone) (06/20/15)
-pking shop (redone) (06/20/15)
-clan capes shop (added) (06/20/15)
-buying anything shop (06/22/15)
-added assault and void shop (06/22/15)
*Assault
-custom assult mini (similar to 2speced) (06/28/15)
-assault point system (06/28/15)
-kill 5 different monsters for assault points (06/28/15)
-assault pnts shop (06/28/15)
-prayer can not be used in assault mini (06/28/15)
*Teleports
-base was using npc to tele you through the game (deleted) (06/25/15)
-added spellbook teleports(06/25/15)
-seperated multi and single pk teleports(06/25/15)
*items
-added comp cape w/ no stats (06/26/15)
-added arma cbow w/ +10 range compared to rcbow(06/26/15)
*clues
-deleted old clues (06/25/15)
-added 4 clue difficulties (06/25/15)
- easy clue, dropped by easy monsters, give low lvl rewards casket (06/25/15)
- med clue, dropped by harder slayer monsters and tz, gives med lvl reward casket (06/25/15)
- hard clue, dropped by bosses, gives high level reward casket (06/25/15)
- random clue, pkp + assult + pc + slayer point shops, gives a random casket (06/25/15)
- cleared old rewards and rewrote (06/25/15)
*Edited tons of prices (6/22/15)
*Made torso, barrows gloves, and defenders tradable and pkable (like 2speced) (6/22/15)
*changed xp rated for easy meele, med mage, and hard range xp (6/22/15)
*added pure command permanently (like 2speced) (06/28/15)
*added maxed command temp for beta testing (06/28/15)
*added barrows command 1k every set temp for beta testing (06/28/15)
*changed all basic server and client naming, ect. (06/29/15)
*fixed godwars int. so it changes without have to relog (06/29/15)
*changed arma cbow int. to wield (06/29/15)
*added 1b ticket (06/29/15)
Have to look at forums update news for any updates after this

[/SPOILER]

I will be adding a lot more and posting in on here every couple days or maybe even more often.
